pullRequest.title: [pentair] Some improvements to the pentair documentation.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed syntax error in the example items, added USB Serial example and expanded the sitemap to be a complete example.
Signed-off-by: Mark Carbonaro mark.carbonaro@gmail.com

commit.message:
Fixed syntax error in the example items, added USB Serial example and expanded the sitemap to be a complete example.

Signed-off-by: Mark Carbonaro <mark.carbonaro@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Can you put each sentence into a separate line and maybe use backticks to surround the file name here and the others above?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Here is an example of a complete sitemap, saved as pentair.sitemap.  Adjust the temperature values for metric is so desired.
          
          
            
            Here is an example of a complete sitemap, saved as `pentair.sitemap`.
          
          
            
            Adjust the temperature values for metric is so desired.

Also just to add on to this.
